title: What is the time limit for claiming RCM in GST? - Quora
tags: Goods and Services Tax in India

response.answer_text: There is no time limit, as it is revenue neutral dealing, as you have to pay output tax on the whole invoice billed by you, as there is no GST component in the input invoice given by your suppliers. input tax credit on the tax that is paid under RCM will be available only after making payment. Hence it will be available in the month in which the RCM has been admitted and paid and filed the necessary return as envisaged in Sec.16 of CGST Act,2017.

ITC can be claimed up to the due date of furnishing of return for the month of September following the end of the financial year to which the invoice pertains (Or) Due date of furnishing of the Annual return, whichever is earlier.
